text: Abelardo Gandia Valdes (born September 5, 1977 in Requena) is a cyclist from Spain. He has a disability: He is blind. He competed at the 1996 Summer Paralympics. He competed at the 2000 Summer Paralympics. He finished second in the Tandem Individual Pursuit track race. == References == Category:Spanish cyclists Category:Living people Category:1977 births Category:Paralympic silver medalists for Spain Category:1996 Summer Paralympics Category:2000 Summer Paralympics Category:People from Valencia
title: Abelardo Gandía Valdés
